content:
Hi all. We'll be starting ballot reconciliation during tomorrow's Hybrid / Intermediary Exchange working call at our usual time and web info...
1:00 ET
https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/262996117

We'll work off of a dashboard we put together to categorize the comments for discussion and serve as a launching off point for folks to drill into the items in Jira. (You'll need to log in to your Jira account to view)
https://jira.hl7.org/secure/Dashboard.jspa?selectPageId=14301

We received a bunch of good comments in the ballot. Look forward to talking them through
